prod_short_desc: Stop the crooks before they empty the ATM!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action with the LEGO® City police as they stop the crooks from getting away with the money from the ATM, featuring a police ATV that includes a radio and a set of handcuffs, plus an ATM with breakout function and opening door on the back, money bills, dynamite and a jackhammer. Includes four minifigures plus a police dog figure.
Includes four minifigures: two police officers and two crooks, plus a police dog figure.
Features a police ATV with room for the dog figure in the back.
Also includes a wall section with ATM breakout function, opening door on the back and space to hold money bills.
Break out the ATM with the dynamite and crack it open with the jackhammer.
Use the police radio to call for help from the police officer and his dog.
Accessory elements include two money bills, a walkie-talkie, handcuffs, dynamite, backpack and a jackhammer.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
ATM measures over 1” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
ATV measures over 2” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
